title: Calamity of Tomorrow - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Horror   Sci-fi   Tragedy   Xuanhuan
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manhua   Cultivation   Demons   Ghosts   Male Protagonist   Mutated Creatures   Mutations   Orphans   Post-apocalyptic   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: Bear Wolfdog   熊狼狗
description:
A star shot through the sky, it also shot through the tranquility of the world.
Supernatural powers descended upon Earth. Who watches in the dark? Who mutters in my ear?
When my growl shatters the sky, when my power tramples the abyss, when I govern all that is living and dead... they shall call me-- God. >
